verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, rebuke \w me|strong="H2142"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* wrath; Neither chasten \w me|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* hot displeasure.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* thine arrows \w stick|strong="H7110"\w* fast \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w*, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* hand presseth \w me|strong="H3256"\w* \w sore|strong="H7110"\w*.

There \w is|strong="H3027"\w* no soundness \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* flesh \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thine indignation; Neither \w is|strong="H3027"\w* there \w any|strong="H3588"\w* health \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* bones \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* sin.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w mine|strong="H6440"\w* iniquities \w are|strong="H6106"\w* gone \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w*: \w As|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* heavy burden \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w* too heavy \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.
\w My|strong="H3588"\w* wounds \w are|strong="H5771"\w* loathsome \w and|strong="H7218"\w* corrupt, \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* foolishness.

\w I|strong="H6440"\w* am pained \w and|strong="H6440"\w* bowed \w down|strong="H6440"\w* greatly; \w I|strong="H6440"\w* go mourning \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* day \w long|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* loins \w are|strong="H3117"\w* filled \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w burning|strong="H1980"\w*; \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w there|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* soundness \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* flesh.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am faint \w and|strong="H1320"\w* sore bruised: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* groaned \w by|strong="H3588"\w* reason \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* disquietness \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* heart.

Lord, \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* desire \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* thee; \w And|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* groaning \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w not|strong="H5704"\w* hidden \w from|strong="H5704"\w* thee.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* heart throbbeth, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* strength faileth \w me|strong="H4480"\w*: \w As|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* light \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w mine|strong="H5048"\w* eyes, \w it|strong="H3808"\w* also \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w gone|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5800"\w* lovers \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* friends \w stand|strong="H5869"\w* aloof \w from|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* plague; \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* kinsmen \w stand|strong="H5869"\w* \w afar|strong="H5869"\w* \w off|strong="H5800"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5975"\w* also \w that|strong="H5975"\w* seek \w after|strong="H7453"\w* \w my|strong="H5048"\w* life lay snares \add for me\add*; \w And|strong="H5975"\w* \w they|strong="H5975"\w* \w that|strong="H5975"\w* seek \w my|strong="H5048"\w* hurt speak mischievous things, \w And|strong="H5975"\w* meditate deceits all \w the|strong="H5975"\w* day \w long|strong="H7350"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* deaf \w man|strong="H5315"\w*, hear \w not|strong="H1696"\w*; \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* am \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dumb \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* openeth \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*.

Yea, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w as|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2795"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w And|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* whose \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H6310"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* reproofs.

\w For|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w thee|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w do|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* hope: \w Thou|strong="H1961"\w* wilt answer, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*, Lest \w they|strong="H3588"\w* rejoice \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w*: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* foot slippeth, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* magnify themselves \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w ready|strong="H4131"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w fall|strong="H4131"\w*, \w And|strong="H7272"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* continually \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* declare \w mine|strong="H5048"\w* iniquity; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* sorry \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* sin.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w mine|strong="H5046"\w* enemies \w are|strong="H2403"\w* lively, \add and\add* \w are|strong="H2403"\w* strong; \w And|strong="H2403"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hate \w me|strong="H5046"\w* wrongfully \w are|strong="H2403"\w* multiplied.

They also \w that|strong="H2416"\w* render evil \w for|strong="H2416"\w* good \w Are|strong="H8267"\w* adversaries unto \w me|strong="H8130"\w*, because I follow \w the|strong="H8130"\w* \w thing|strong="H2416"\w* \w that|strong="H2416"\w* \w is|strong="H2416"\w* good.

Forsake \w me|strong="H7291"\w* \w not|strong="H7451"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8478"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w*, \w be|strong="H7451"\w* \w not|strong="H7451"\w* far \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w*.
Make haste \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5800"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* salvation.
